mapper.select: select RN, FB_NO, FB_TITLE, FB_USERID,FB_likeCnt, FB_hateCnt ,FB_COUNT, FB_AVAILABLE, FB_CONTENT, CASE WHEN fb_date > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(fb_date,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(fb_date,'YY/MM/DD') END fb_date, reCnt from ( select ROWNUM as RN, A.* , (SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE FB_NO = a.fb_no) AS reCnt FROM (select * from free_board order by fb_no desc) A ) where RN > #{startList} and RN <= ((#{page}) * #{listSize})

select RN, FB_NO, FB_TITLE, FB_CONTENT, FB_LIKECNT, CASE WHEN fb_date > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(fb_date,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(fb_date,'YY/MM/DD') END fb_date from ( select ROWNUM as RN, A.* FROM (select * from free_board order by fb_date desc) A ) where RN >= 0 and RN <= 5
select * from ( select ROWNUM as RN, A.* FROM (select * from free_board order by fb_likeCnt desc) A ) where RN >= 0 and RN <= 5
select * from ( select ROWNUM as RN, A.* FROM (select * from free_board order by fb_count desc) A ) where RN >= 0 and RN <= 5
select count(*) as listCnt from free_board

SELECT FB_NO, FB_TITLE, FB_USERID, FB_PWD, FB_COUNT, FB_AVAILABLE, FB_LIKECNT, FB_HATECNT, FB_CONTENT, CASE WHEN fb_date > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(fb_date,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(fb_date,'YY/MM/DD') END fb_date FROM free_board WHERE fb_no = #{fb_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET FB_COUNT = FB_COUNT + 1 WHERE FB_NO = #{ FB_NO}
update free_board set fb_likeCnt = fb_likeCnt + 1 where fb_no = #{fb_no }
update free_board set fb_hateCnt = fb_hateCnt + 1 where fb_no = #{fb_no }
update free_board set fb_title = #{fb_title}, fb_content = #{fb_content} where fb_no = #{fb_no}
